--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Stacy <EmprzAnastazia@a...>" 
<EmprzAnastazia@a...> wrote:
> 
> > > "Wheeljack?" She padded inside the wreck. "Wheeljack?!"
> > 
> > "Over here!" he calls from under a console.  Only his legs are 
> > visible.  "I've met a lot of pretty girls in my lifetime, but 
this 
> is 
> > the first time one's come looking for me.  What's up?"
> 
> Transforming into her robot mode & gracefully padding over to him, 
> standing near the visable legs. "Don't get your hopes up. I have a 
> special task to ask of you. IF... you are willing to take on the 
> challenge."
> 
> "The first task, is to rebuild my former form. The second is only 
if 
> you need the assistance of Teletran One, otherwise, don't even 
bother 
> with the second task."
> 
> She knelt closer to where he was. "So... do you think you can do 
it? 
> In a very short amount of time that is." she smirked.

"Let me see ..." Jackie slides out from under the control 
panel.  "Rebuilding a robot form ..." he accesses his databanks, 
trying to match the name Maxima into his history files.  "Seeker, 
right?"

He stands up and looks her over.  "We've got three options.  If I 
installed a flight mode and associated components on your current 
body, it would take a few hours.  On the other hand, building a 
transformer shell from scratch could take days - but it's a lot more 
authentic.  Or we could combine the two, giving you a temporary 
upgrade to tide you over until your new body is ready.  Either way, 
you're putting a lot of trust in me."
